title: A baby that was photographed being passed to US soldiers over razor wire in Afghanistan has been safely reunited with their father
content:
1. A baby that was photographed being passed to US soldiers over razor wire in Afghanistan has been safely reunited with their father  Yahoo News
  2. Watch chaos unfold at Kabul airport's north gate  CNN
  3. Heartbreaking image shows crying baby handed over to US soldier in Kabul  New York Post
  4. What Happened to the Afghan Baby  Inside Edition
  5. US Marine plucks baby to safety over wall at Kabul airport  Yahoo! Voices
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アフガニスタンで米兵に渡されていた写真を撮られた赤ちゃんが、無事に父親と再会しました。
一个被拍到在阿富汗通过剃刀铁丝网传递给美国士兵的婴儿已经安全地与他们的父亲团聚。
一個被拍到在阿富汗通過剃刀鐵絲網傳遞給美國士兵的嬰兒已經安全地與他們的父親團聚。
